samples.context: The cells are cube-shaped in cuboidal epithelium. Linings of kidney tubules and ducts of salivary glands are composed of cuboidal epithelium.
samples.question: What shape are the cells in cuboidal epithelium?

samples.context: Cuboidal epithelium provides mechanical support and may play the role of secretion.
samples.question: What role do cuboidal cells play in secretion?

samples.context: Cuboidal cells provide mechanical support and are found in various organs.
samples.question: Where is cuboidal epithelium commonly found?

samples.context: Cells of epithelium may play the role of secretion and then they are called glandular epithelium.
samples.question: What type of epithelium performs secretion?

samples.context: Linings of kidney tubules and ducts of salivary glands are composed of cuboidal epithelium.
samples.question: Which organs have cuboidal epithelium lining?
